page.title: 16Tourists in Dulverton
page.content: The pleasant countryside around Dulverton attracts many visitors,over 1 millon each year.Tourists are the major income of many shops,hotels and caravan sites in the little town and provide lots of jobs for local people. Parking is a problem in the narrow streets of Dulverton especially when there are coach loads of people milling about the town.The National Park is trying to preserve and enhance the natural beauty of the area.Also they are trying to promote its enjoyment for the public. One other problem with visitors is litter.They eat their picnic lunch and throw litter down any where.
